attributes.action: Domestic abusers to face prosecution when their victim's statement is withdrawn.
attributes.background: Many victims of domestic abuse withdraw statements (retraction of allegations) - resulting in their abuser not facing prosecution. This needs to change to protect the victims and to ensure abusers are given the punishment they deserve.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
